I don't know whether this torrent is fake or not (I haven't tried it myself), but it probably is. 

But the important thing is this: Do NOT listen to bryan_202 and absolutely do NOT download his torrent. It's proven to be fake. You get a BSOD once you run his crack.

I repeat: Do NOT listen to anything that bryan_202 writes.

Greetings TPB.

I am in the process of running it. I will let you know how it fares. What I have seen so far:

The backsplash for the installer is of Duke holding a warthog's head, and the theme song for DNF is playing during the installation. The language is in Russian, so make your best guess as to what each word stands for.
Just completed the first mission (Cyclops in the stadium map). No graphical issues, no crashes, but the core file (RUN_DNFD.EXE) does register as a virus. I'd say it is a false positive.
Completed the second mission. This demo is running flawlessly.
although the install is in russian, the rest of the game is in english! Thanks NiGHt-LEshiY!!!
English?

It is NOT a fake, and there is NO virus. It's no-Steam.ru release, which has great reputation in cracked games.
I wish all the best for people, who just give their thanks to us.

thank you NiGHt-LEshiY you were the first person to deliver this working demo cracked to the masses and trust me i was looking hard!

everything is all good big ups to NiGHt-LEshiY and no-steam.ru!

as for the game after waiting this long..... not quite as good as i had hoped, hopefuly the full game is better, i was getting graphical glitches like crazy and the controls feel a bit light, also the guns don't really feel that powerful, we shall see... hopefuly the full game lives up to its name!
Still cool that they finally managed to finish the game... just after announcing it 28th of april 1997 ;)
